name: Linzer Pro Block Stain Brush - White China Bristle Blend
description: This 5 in. professional quality block stain brush features a high capacity blend of white China bristle and polyester. The brush works well with all stains, water proofers and sealers. It is recommended for exterior surfaces.Block design paints more area in less timeThreaded plastic handle which accepts extension polesRust and solvent resistant ferruleDurable and reusable
